definition: bob forward and under so as to feed off the bottom of a body of water
details:
verb
- bob forward and under so as to feed off the bottom of a body of water
- dip a foot or hand briefly into a liquid
- work with in an amateurish manner
= example: work with in an amateurish manner
= synonyms: smatter
- play in or as if in water, as of small children
= synonyms: paddle
